Package de.frankfurt.uni.vcp.gui.controllers

Class Summary
AbstractScreenController Common abstract super class for all nifty screen controllers.
HelpScreenController Help screen controller, currently empty, who know probably it's needed at some point.
HudScreenController Players man "hud" screen within the game.
MapScreenController This is the screen controllers used during map setup of the game This class provides the functionality to select from a given list of maps provided by the game server.
PlayerScreenController This is the screen controllers used during player setup of the game This class provides the functionality to add players to the game.
ScenarioScreenController Scenario screen controller.
ServerScreenController  
SettingsScreenController Settings screen controller.
StartScreenController This is the screen controllers used for the startup screen.
